column6:
"Vicious Cycle", Part 4,2006,10
Ghost Rider's trail of vengeance leads him to a crushing realization: It may be impossible for him to thwart Lucifer's plan to consolidate power on earth...because Ghost Rider is part of the plan! Will Ghost Rider follow Dr. Strange's advice and turn away from vengeance? More importantly, can he?
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Dan Brown | letterer:Joe Caramagna | penciller:Javier Saltares | penciller (cover):Mark Texeira | writer:Daniel Way
